parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get visibility state of [[Eden Editor]] lines.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''get3DENLinesVisible'''
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format [showMap, showScene]
* showScene: [[Boolean]] - visibility in the scene
* showMap : [[Boolean]] - visibility in the map

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[get3DENLinesVisible]] [[select]] 0) [[then]] {[[hint]] "Lines are visible in the map.";};</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> 
[[set3DENLinesVisible]]
[[set3DENIconsVisible]]
[[get3DENIconsVisible]]
</value></part></template></root>
